Text:

Error! D3DXCreateTextureFromFile 

Someone else encountered this problem and maybe even has a solution?
I also crash when starting the scenario.
Starpoint Gemini Update 1 [ENG][LGM Games] 2010 TRiViUM   http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6043034

Yep, the first Gemini scenario/campaign is crashing after the update1, kinda sad, because i don't like to start playing from the middle /

Niestety cały czas pierwsza kampania/scenariusz nie odpala nawet po update1, choć można zacząć od drugiej, ale czy jest sens zaczynać od środka?

Bollocks
i play with patch v1.4 and work fine. for now look really ok

Great game. Takes a while to get into, but after that, very rewarding. Release installs fine. After get, google the newly released .exe (DRM was buggy, so they released one without). Replace the old one with the new one, then patch to the newest. Patch is downloadable on their site (once again, google's your best friend). Play!!

disappointing
first time i ever had any issues using a clone drive or burning a game file.
doesn't mount with any thing, tried power iso and daemon tools!
tried burning to disk all it does is lock up my drive until i manual eject the disk. 

what a waist!!!!!! of blank dvd and download
